# position

**Instance Property**

The position of the halo effect relative to its shape.

## Declaration

```swift
var position: UIFocusHaloEffect.Position { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusHaloEffect/Position-swift.enum/automatic].

## Configuring a halo effect

- **containerView**: The container view to place the halo effect into.
- **referenceView**: The view to place the halo effect above.
- **UIFocusHaloEffect.Position**: Constants that describe positions for drawing the halo focus effect.
